meanings.definition: To make social; to interact with others in a friendly manner.
meanings.sent1: She socialized with her classmates during lunch, chatting and laughing.
meanings.sent2: The new student quickly socialized with the group, making friends easily.
meanings.sent3: The shy puppy was socialized at the dog park, learning to play with other dogs.
meanings.sent4: The seeds were socialized in the fertile soil, growing into healthy plants.
meanings.sent5: The children were socialized at the playground, developing important social skills.

meanings.definition: To adapt to social norms and behaviors.
meanings.sent1: After moving to a new country, she had to socialize to the local customs.
meanings.sent2: It took him some time to socialize to the office culture and expectations.
meanings.sent3: The robot had to be socialized to human behavior to blend in seamlessly.
meanings.sent4: The chameleon can socialize to different environments by changing its colors.
meanings.sent5: The young bird needs to socialize to flying in order to survive in the wild.

meanings.definition: To provide social services or benefits to a group.
meanings.sent1: The organization aims to socialize healthcare to underserved communities.
meanings.sent2: Volunteers work tirelessly to socialize support to those in need after the disaster.
meanings.sent3: The magician decided to socialize free entertainment to the children at the hospital.
meanings.sent4: The government plans to socialize education to ensure equal opportunities for all.
meanings.sent5: The charity's mission is to socialize resources to improve the lives of the homeless.

meanings.definition: To introduce someone to social activities or experiences.
meanings.sent1: She wanted to socialize her friend to the joys of hiking in nature.
meanings.sent2: The mentor took the intern under his wing to socialize her to the business world.
meanings.sent3: The parents decided to socialize their child to different cultures through travel.
meanings.sent4: The teacher aims to socialize her students to the wonders of science through experiments.
meanings.sent5: The camp counselor's role is to socialize campers to outdoor adventures and teamwork.
